snippet: Surgical patients who listen to music — even while they are under general anesthesia — have less anxiety and need less pain medication during recovery than those who do not, a large review of studies has found.
abstract: Surgical patients who listen to music — even while they are under general anesthesia — have less anxiety and need less pain medication during recovery than those who do not, a large review of studies has found.

headline.main: Music Can Help Recovery From Surgery
headline.print_headline: Music: Music Can Be Postsurgical Aid
